00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Symon extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'symon';
00045     public $User= '_symon';
00046     
00047     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/libexec/symon -v 2>&1';
00048     
00049     private $layoutsPath= '/var/www/htdocs/comixwall/View/symon/layouts';
00050     private $rrdsPath= '/var/www/htdocs/comixwall/View/symon/rrds/localhost';
00051     
00052     function Symon()
00053     {
00054         global $TmpFile;
00055         
00056         parent::Model();
00057         
00058         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/libexec/symon > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00059         
00060         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00061             $this->Commands,
00062             array(
00063                 'SetCpus'=> array(
00064                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00065                     'desc'  =>  _('Set symon cpus'),
00066                     ),
00067                 
00068                 'SetIfs'=>  array(
00069                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME, NAME),
00070                     'desc'  =>  _('Set symon ifs'),
00071                     ),
00072                 
00073                 'SetSensors'=>  array(
00074                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00075                     'desc'  =>  _('Set symon sensors'),
00076                     ),
00077                 
00078                 'SetPartitions'=>   array(
00079                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00080                     'desc'  =>  _('Set symon partitions'),
00081                     ),
00082                 
00083                 'SetConf'=> array(
00084                     'argv'  =>  array(NAME, NAME),
00085                     'desc'  =>  _('Set symon conf'),
00086                     ),
00087                 )
00088             );
00089     }
00090     
00091     function SetCpus()
00092     {
00093         $ncpu= 1;
00094         if (($hwncpu= $this->GetSysCtl('hw.ncpu')) !== FALSE) {
00095             if (preg_match('|^hw.ncpu=(\d+)$|ms', $hwncpu, $match)) {
00096                 $ncpu= $match[1];
00097             }
00098         }
00099         
00100         $layout= '';
00101         for ($c= 0; $c < $ncpu; $c++) {
00102             $layout.= "graph    rrdfile=$this->rrdsPath/cpu$c.rrd, title=\"CPU $c\";\n";
00103         }
00104 
00105         $re= '|(\s*group\h+name\h*=\h*"CPU\h+Load";\s*)(.*)|ms';
00106         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/cpus.layout', $re, '${1}'.$layout);
00107     }
00108 
00109     function SetIfs($lanif, $wanif)
00110     {
00111         $re= '|^(\s*graph\s+rrdfile\s*=\s*[\w/]+/if_)(\w+\d+)(\.rrd\s*,\s*title\s*=\s*"Internal Interface\s+\()(\w+\d+)(\)\s*"\s*;)|ms';
00112         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/ifs.layout', $re, '${1}'.$lanif.'${3}'.$lanif.'${5}');
00113         
00114         $re= '|^(\s*graph\s+rrdfile\s*=\s*[\w/]+/if_)(\w+\d+)(\.rrd\s*,\s*title\s*=\s*"External Interface\s+\()(\w+\d+)(\)\s*"\s*;)|ms';
00115         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/ifs.layout', $re, '${1}'.$wanif.'${3}'.$wanif.'${5}');
00116 
00117         $re= '|(\s+lan_rrd\s*=\s*[\w/]+/if_)(\w+\d+)(\.rrd\s*,\s*)|ms';
00118         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/states.layout', $re, '${1}'.$lanif.'${3}');
00119         
00120         $re= '|(\s+wan_rrd\s*=\s*[\w/]+/if_)(\w+\d+)(\.rrd\s*,\s*)|ms';
00121         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/states.layout', $re, '${1}'.$wanif.'${3}');
00122         
00123         return $retval;
00124     }
00125 
00126     function SetSensors()
00127     {
00128         if (($sensorslist= $this->GetSensors()) !== FALSE) {
00129             $layout= '';
00130             if (isset($sensorslist['temp']) && count($sensorslist['temp']) > 0) {
00131                 foreach ($sensorslist['temp'] as $s) {
00132                     $layout.= "graph    rrdfile=$this->rrdsPath/sensor_$s.rrd, title=\"Temperature ($s)\";\n";
00133                 }
00134             }
00135             
00136             $layout.= 'group    name="Fan";'."\n";
00137             if (isset($sensorslist['fan']) && count($sensorslist['fan']) > 0) {
00138                 foreach ($sensorslist['fan'] as $s) {
00139                     $layout.= "graph    rrdfile=$this->rrdsPath/sensor_$s.rrd, title=\"Fan ($s)\";\n";
00140                 }
00141             }
00142         
00143             $re= '|(\s*group\h+name\h*=\h*"Temperature";\s*)(.*)|ms';
00144             return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/sensors.layout', $re, '${1}'.$layout);
00145         }
00146         return FALSE;
00147     }
00148 
00149     function SetPartitions()
00150     {
00151         $partitions= $this->GetPartitions();
00152         
00153         $layout= '';
00154         $disks= array();
00155         foreach ($partitions as $part => $mdir) {
00156             if (preg_match('|/dev/((\w+\d+)[a-z]+)|', $part, $match)) {
00157                 $p= $match[1];
00158                 $layout.= "graph    rrdfile=$this->rrdsPath/df_$p.rrd, title=\"Partition $p ($mdir)\";\n";
00159                 
00160                 if (!in_array($match[2], $disks)) {
00161                     $disks[]= $match[2];
00162                 }
00163             }
00164         }
00165         
00166         $re= '|(\s*group\h+name\h*=\h*"Partitions\h+Usages";\s*)(.*)|ms';
00167         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/partitions.layout', $re, '${1}'.$layout);
00168     
00169         $layout= '';
00170         foreach ($disks as $d) {
00171             $layout.= "graph    rrdfile=$this->rrdsPath/io_$d.rrd, title=\"Disk $d\";\n";
00172         }
00173         
00174         $re= '|(\s*group\h+name\h*=\h*"Disk\h+I/O";\s*)(.*)|ms';
00175         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->layoutsPath.'/disks.layout', $re, '${1}'.$layout);
00176 
00177         return $retval;
00178     }
00179 
00180     function SetConf($lanif, $wanif)
00181     {
00183         $ncpu= 1;
00184         if (($hwncpu= $this->GetSysCtl('hw.ncpu')) !== FALSE) {
00185             if (preg_match('|^hw.ncpu=(\d+)$|ms', $hwncpu, $match)) {
00186                 $ncpu= $match[1];
00187             }
00188         }
00189 
00190         $cpus= '';
00191         for ($i= 0; $i < $ncpu; $i++) {
00192             $cpus.= "   cpu($i),\n";
00193         }
00194         
00195         $others= "  mem,\n  pf,\n   mbuf,\n";
00196         
00197         $ifs= " if(lo0),\n  if($lanif),\n   if($wanif),\n";
00198         
00199         $partitions= $this->GetPartitions();
00200         $parts= '';
00201         $disks= array();
00202         foreach ($partitions as $part => $mdir) {
00203             if (preg_match('|/dev/((\w+\d+)[a-z]+)|', $part, $match)) {
00204                 $parts.= '  df('.$match[1]."),\n";
00205                 if (!in_array($match[2], $disks)) {
00206                     $disks[]= $match[2];
00207                 }
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211         $ios= '';
00212         foreach ($disks as $io) {
00213             $ios.= "    io($io),\n";
00214         }
00215         
00216         $sensors= '';
00217         if (($sensorslist= $this->GetSensors()) !== FALSE) {
00218             if (isset($sensorslist['temp']) && count($sensorslist['temp']) > 0) {
00219                 foreach ($sensorslist['temp'] as $s) {
00220                     $sensors.= "    sensor($s),\n";
00221                 }
00222             }
00223             
00224             if (isset($sensorslist['fan']) && count($sensorslist['fan']) > 0) {
00225                 foreach ($sensorslist['fan'] as $s) {
00226                     $sensors.= "    sensor($s),\n";
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230 
00231         $proclist= array(
00232             'httpd',
00233             'dansguardian',
00234             'snort',
00235             'clamd',
00236             'p3scan',
00237             'perl',
00238             'sshd',
00239             'squid',
00240             'smtp-gated',
00241             'named',
00242             'dhcpd',
00243             'sockd',
00244             'imspector',
00245             'ftp-proxy',
00246             'openvpn',
00247         );
00248         $procs= '';
00249         foreach ($proclist as $p) {
00250             $procs.= "  proc($p),\n";
00251         }
00252         
00253         $conf= "\n".$cpus.$others.$ifs.$ios.$parts.$sensors.$procs;
00254         
00255         $re= '|(\s*monitor\s*\{\h*)([^\}]*)(\s*\})|ms';
00256         $retval=  $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/symon.conf', $re, '${1}'.$conf.'${3}');
00257 
00258         $conf= preg_replace('/( )/ms', '        ', $conf);
00259         
00260         $re= '|(\s*source\s*127\.0\.0\.1\s*\{\s*accept\s*\{\h*)([^\}]*)(\h*\})|ms';
00261         $retval&= $this->ReplaceRegexp('/etc/symux.conf', $re, '${1}'.$conf.'   ${3}');
00262 
00263         return $retval;
00264     }
00265 }
